EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of August 10, 2015 <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld> Connect with Us at Booth #821 VMworld 2015 is coming soon to San Francisco! Pivotal is a Gold sponsor and strategic partner in VMware's Devops and Developers Days at VMworld this year.
Connect with us at booth #821 or attend one of our sessions on Pivotal Cloud Foundry and educating VMware customers on the journey to become Cloud Native. LEARN MORE <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15> Going All Microservices with Spring Cloud and Pivotal Cloud Foundry, a Discussion with Josh Long August 12, 2015 This is a two part episode on Spring Boot and Spring Cloud. In the second part, we discuss Spring Cloud and what it does to handle the tedious parts of creating microservices. We also talk about how Pivotal Cloud Foundry fits in as the runtime. In the first part, we discussed Spring Boot and re-thinking about Java application in a process-centric way.
Subscribe <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/going-all-microservices-with-spring-cloud-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15> EMC Documentum Goes Cloud Native With Pivotal Cloud Foundry August 10, 2015 Today, software companies across every industry must address the requirements to migrate their applications to various cloud models—public, private, and hybrid versions of IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS. This case study shares how EMC Documentum chose Pivotal Cloud Foundry to do so. The EMC team faced additional challenges around consumption-based pricing, packaging, and agility. Their approach is explained along with the business outcomes, which includes a 75 percent savings in deployment time.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies-2/emc-documentum-goes-cloud-native-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15> Meet Cornelia Davis: Pivotal's Role Model for Women in Cloud August 07, 2015 Pivotal, with its mission to transform how the world builds software, attracts some of the best and brightest talent across the world. This week, our own Cornelia Davis, director of platform engineering for Pivotal Cloud Foundry, was recognized as one of the “Top 10 Women in Cloud” by CloudNOW, a non-profit consortium of women in cloud computing.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/pivotal-people/meet-cornelia-davis-pivotals-role-model-for-women-in-cloud?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15> VISIT OUR P.O.V. BLOG <http://blog.pivotal.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15> Pivotal Academy Announces Instructor-Led Training Dates through October Looking for hands-on training on the latest Pivotal technologies? Pivotal Academy has a wide array of technical training classes designed to meet your needs. Instructor-led classes are now available through fall and include many Live Online options - allowing you and your staff to receive training without the time and expense of travel.
Learn more about our complete portfolio of classes and view the entire fall schedule here <http://www.pivotal.io/training?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-10-15>.
